casebody.data:
CITY OF PASSAIC, PETITIONER-PETITIONER, v. BOTANY MILLS, INC., ET AL., RESPONDENTS-RESPONDENTS. Mr. William N. Gurtman for the petitioner. Mr. Nicholas Martini, Mr. Vincent E. Hull, Mr. Ezra W. Karhus and Mr. Thomas E. Dufy for the respondents. May 14, 1962.

See same case below: 72 N. J. Super. 449.
